channel.title: Problems loading the server on Ubuntu
channel.description:
So when I start the server, this is the error message it gives me. If anyone can help me out thanks! I also have jdk 6 installed with apache ant 1.8
[code] runserver: [java] 17 NPC Scripts loaded! [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.clansystem.ClanHandler.loadClans(ClanHandler.java:26) [java] at org.rscdaemon.Loading Banned IP Addressess [java] [java] [java] Banned IP Addresses Loaded Successfully [java] Today is Friday. The wilderness is P2P [java] folder null [java] server.clansystem.ClanHandler.<init>(ClanHandler.java:18) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<init>(Server.java:380) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.button1ActionPerformed(GUI.java:163) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.access$000(GUI.java:31) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI$2.actionPerformed(GUI.java:670) [java] at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2012) [java] at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2335) [java] at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.fireActionPerformed(DefaultButtonModel.java:404) [java] at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.setPressed(DefaultButtonModel.java:259) [java] at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicButtonListener.mouseReleased(BasicButtonListener.java:252) [java] at java.awt.Component.processMouseEvent(Component.java:6288) [java] at javax.swing.JComponent.processMouseEvent(JComponent.java:3267) [java] at java.awt.Component.processEvent(Component.java:6053) [java] at java.awt.Container.processEvent(Container.java:2045) [java] at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:4649) [java] at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2103) [java] at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4475) [java] at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.retargetMouseEvent(Container.java:4633) [java] at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.processMouseEvent(Container.java:4297) [java] at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.dispatchEvent(Container.java:4227) [java] at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2089) [java] at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2587) [java] at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4475) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:675) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue.access$300(EventQueue.java:96) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue$2.run(EventQueue.java:634) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue$2.run(EventQueue.java:632) [java] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) [java] at java.security.AccessControlContext$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(AccessControlContext.java:108) [java] at java.security.AccessControlContext$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(AccessControlContext.java:119) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:648) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:646) [java] at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) [java] at java.security.AccessControlContext$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(AccessControlContext.java:108) [java] at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:645) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:275) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:200) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThread.java:190) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:185) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:177) [java] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:138) [/code]

item.title: Problems loading the server on Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Might be how the banned IP addresses are loaded and whatever folder they are loading from. Is it set to load them on line 81 of the ClanHandler class from a hard coded windows directory? It says folder is nullâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Problems loading the server on Ubuntu
